body:
Comment 3: 
We don't know how many of these /r/ cases exist.
The dashboard only records a goinstall if it can load
code.google.com/p/project.  However, since they are
not discoverable via the dashboard I expect there are
relatively few.

So the answer to what about people who don't know
about /r/ will have to be 'they need to learn about it'.

If there are specific projects that are in widespread use
and need an /r/ path, they can be special cased in gofix.

Russ
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
